bar-tables.Name: Trestle Bar Table
bar-tables.Body:
This trestle bar table is a beautiful original old table from the 1950's rejuvenated by artisans.

Metal inlay covers cracks and adds to the individuality - each table is a unique art piece to treasure for a lifetime.

Legs fold up for ease of transport.

bar-tables.Name: Kitchen  Bar Work Table
bar-tables.Body: Your kitchen is the heart of your home and for many, creating a warm and inviting ambiance is an important part of designing the perfect kitchen space. Crafted from solid Mango and metal framing, the Kitchen Work Bench is the perfect addition to almost any home. The timber top bench features a natural edge. Convenient open storage below and pot/utensil hooks above. This piece will have you falling in love with your space over and over again for years to come

bar-tables.Name: Parquet Bar Table
bar-tables.Body: Made from reclaimed Elm, this bar table can accommodate up to 12 thirsty and or hungry guests.

bar-tables.Name: Hampton Bar Table
bar-tables.Body:
An addition to the Hampton Range of Outdoor furniture is this Bar Table. Bar Stool is also available.

Stainless Steel and Teak are arguably the best combination of materials for low maintenance and long lasting outdoor furniture.

bar-tables.Name: Recycled Timber Bar Table
bar-tables.Body:
Recycled Australian hardwood is used to make this classic bar table.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

As pictured...1400 x 600 x 900(h).

bar-tables.Name: RAT S/S Bar Table
bar-tables.Body:
This bar table combines a stainless steel base with a recycled Australian hardwood top. The addition of heavy duty castors (optional) not only adds to the overall design of the table, but also makes it very easy to move where needed around your home.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

As pictured...1800 x 620 x 900(h).

bar-tables.Name: RAT (5) Bar Table
bar-tables.Body:
The RAT (5) Dining Table has given way to a bar table design. This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

bar-tables.Name: RAT Bar Table (2)
bar-tables.Body:
Recycled Australian hardwood is used to make this classic bar table. The addition of castors creates a very versatile table.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

As pictured...1600 x 600 x 900(h).

bar-trolleys.Name: Drinks Trolley Bronze
bar-trolleys.Body: This entertaining essential features a toughened glass top and shelf with an art deco styled antique bronze finished metal frame and castors so it can effortlessly be wheeled into position whenever required. Also available in a champagne finish.

bar-trolleys.Name: Drinks Trolley Bronze
bar-trolleys.Body: This entertaining essential features a toughened glass top and shelf with an art deco styled antique bronze finished metal frame and castors so it can effortlessly be wheeled into position whenever required. Also available in a champagne finish.

bar-trolleys.Name: Gold Bar Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: Display your favourite luxury brand liquor brand bottles and sparkling glasses with this Mini Bar Cart. With four lockable castors attached to the luxurious gold frame and a beautiful two-tiered glass shelf, this bar cart offers easy portability between rooms as you entertain your guests in style! Alternatively, set it next to your couch or seating area as a little chic side table.

bar-trolleys.Name: Terrazzo Bar Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: The Terrazzo Bar Cart is circular in its design offering a unique twist on the classic bar cart. This smaller sized cart is perfect for fitting into small places and with a two-tiered terrazzo shelf, there is still plenty of room to display your luxury brand liquor brand bottles and sparkling glasses with effortless sophistication. With four lockable castors attached to the sturdy gold frame and handle, this bar cart offers easy portability between rooms as you entertain guests in style!

bar-trolleys.Name: Round Drinks Trolley
bar-trolleys.Body: This drinks trolley is the perfect storage unit for your spirits or wine for apartments or compact spaces. Made from a black coated iron with a rustic copper colour highlight, it consists of three storage compartments with mesh metal base, and three castor wheels with one castor with a locking mechanism. Chic & sleek, this trolley is fully assembled and ready for use.

bar-trolleys.Name: Mini Home Bar Trolley / Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: Mini Home Bar on castors is made from Pine wood and metal trim. Compact & moveable, it brings the drinks cabinet to you. There is storage for 16 bottles of wine, glass storage & mixers and spirits in the pull out door. Extra storage is in the 2 pull out drawers, it truly is the great entertainer.

bar-trolleys.Name: Heritage Trolley / Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: Wood and Matt Black Metal kitchen trolley cart with mirror base.  Also available with plain wood base.

bar-trolleys.Name: Heritage Trolley / Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: Wood and Matt Black Metal kitchen trolley cart with mirror base.  Also available with plain wood base.

bar-trolleys.Name: Metal Auxiliary Trolley / Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: This metal auxiliary table features two interchangeable levels.  The bottom level has the same finish as the rest of the structure, whilst the upper level has a glass table top in a smoky black finish. The structure also creates two handles so that it can be easily pushed arpund.

bar-trolleys.Name: Round Gold Steel Bar Trolley / Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: Drinks anyone? I would laugh when I saw one of these back in the day! Not anymore! They are back! I'll drink to that! Features mirrored shelves.

bar-trolleys.Name: Luxe Oval Bar Trolley / Cart
bar-trolleys.Body: Look no further than the brass oval mirror cart. Simple and elegant, it will make any room look better. The colour finish is a mottled brass colour tone, and features two handles and four castor wheels which can be locked into place. Functional with a touch of bling, it will be the perfect entertainers showpiece

beds.Name: Koko Bedhead
beds.Body: Koko headboard has a 100% handmade panel made up of a mosaic of unique pieces of coconut shell.

beds.Name: Beyla Bedhead
beds.Body: The Beyla headboard combines the natural essence of ash wood with vertical slatting, playing with light and texture. Made from solid ash wood, FSC certified timber. Includes metal fittings to be secured to the wall.

beds.Name: Rasha Headboard
beds.Body:
Rasha headboard is a natural timber finish product of oak veneer and edges in solid oak with an irregular cut. The irregular cut of Rasha's sustainable oak veneer makes it totally unique. A design that puts wood front and centre to reveal unique tones, shapes, grains and whose curved edges create organic, exclusive shapes.

PRICE DROP!

beds.Name: Calixta Bedhead
beds.Body: Calixta headboard 163cm wide is made of brown hand-braided leather straps. The structure is also made from solid teak wood with an aged finish so it is a designer piece that will last you a long time. Due to being natural materials, each headboard has its own tones and textures making each piece exclusive and unrepeatable.

beds.Name: Wing Bedhead
beds.Body: The Wing headboard has a 100% handmade panel made up of a mosaic of unique pieces of solid teak.

beds.Name: Krysia Bedhead
beds.Body: Krysia headboard is made of rattan with a natural finish and weaved rattan. 100% handmade and eco-friendly each Krysia piece is unique with its very own bamboo knots. We know that exclusivity is your thing.

beds.Name: Upholstered Bedhead
beds.Body:
Fully upholstered bed head. This free standing design is simply supported by the mattress and base. This is possible because of the use of a solid,rigid frame. The price listed is for a queen size bedhead. Other fabrics and designs are available.

MADE IN MELBOURNE!

beds.Body:
This was a special order for a customer who had quite specific requirements. Apart from fitting a particular king size mattress, the head board couldn't go higher than the window ledge, the base was to have a 'floating' effect and the bedsides needed to be attached to the head board.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

bedside-tables.Name: Licia Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: Licia bedside table with 1 drawer is made from solid mango wood with a natural finish. Licia is an artisanal design made from pieces of solid sustainable mango wood, set individually to create the rounded forms. A trend that brings movement and fluidity to your interiors.

bedside-tables.Name: Beyla Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: The Beyla bedside table brings the natural essence of ash wood and slatting, playing with light and texture. The door is made of slatted solid oak, and the body is oak veneer. This bedside includes a soft-closing hinges and adjustable feet. FSC certified timber.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">Some assembly is required, to attach the legs to the base. And this product comes with an option to adjust the door hinges to open in the opposite direction.

bedside-tables.Name: Rasha Bedside
bedside-tables.Body:
Rasha bedside table is a natural timber finish product of oak veneer and drawers faced with solid oak edges with an irregular cut. The irregular cut of Rasha sustainable oak veneer makes it totally unique. A design that puts wood front and centre to reveal unique tones, shapes and grains and whose curved edges create organic, exclusive shapes. Features include: hidden runners with soft-close system and adjustable legs.

PRICE DROP!

bedside-tables.Name: Karpenter Wide Open Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: This beautiful and stylish Karpenter Wide Open Bedside, made with solid FSC Reclaimed Teak. Also available in satin black finish over White Oak and clear White Oak. This classy table comes with a little shelf so you can stash your nighttime pieces away.

bedside-tables.Name: Karpenter Wide Open Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: This beautiful and stylish Karpenter Wide Open Bedside, made with solid FSC Reclaimed Teak. Also available in satin black finish over White Oak and clear White Oak. This classy table comes with a little shelf so you can stash your nighttime pieces away.

bedside-tables.Name: Tempo Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: The Tempo Bedside with 1 drawer & open compartment is made from recycled teak with SVLK Legal certification for recycled sustainable timber. It is sanded smooth with a fine brushed finish and set on a coated iron frame in a matte black finish. The drawers with eyehole door holes maintain a clean smooth profile. The simple and functional design will fit into a multitude of decor finishes, and perfectly matches the Tempo dresser and sideboard.

bedside-tables.Name: Karpenter Bedside
bedside-tables.Body:
This beautiful and stylish Bedside Table by Karpenter is made with solid American Walnut. This little table comes with a soft closing drawer to sneak away any little pieces you do not want on display.

Also available in European Oak and Recycled Teak.

bedside-tables.Body:
Delsie bedside table is 100% handmade and is constructed of solid acacia wood with a natural finish. In addition, it has decorative detail on the draws with different depths which are also handmade. The legs are metal painted black. A designer piece that, in addition to having character, has a unique personality. Natural timbers may exhibit variances in grain, colour and texture, sometimes visible knots, filling and butterfly joints will be evident and it can change colour with age. These variations are normal characteristics of all timber species.

Media Unit and Sideboard also available in this design (see website).

Dimensions: 400 x 350 x 550mm (h).

PRICE DROP!

bedside-tables.Name: Image Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: Image is a bedside table in solid wattle timber with a geometric shape detail on the front of the draw. Natural timbers may exhibit variances in grain, colour and texture, sometimes visable knots, filling and butterfly joints will be evident and it can change colour with age. bedside-tables.Name: WA Marri Bedside
bedside-tables.Body:
Marri timber is renowned for its distinctive
gum veins and characteristics which make
it one of the most unique timbers in the
world and the perfect timber for creating
fine handcrafted furniture.
Such characteristics are born from
withstanding extreme weather conditions
such as bushfires, severe storms and
prolonged periods of drought.
The Marri timber used in this product is
ethically sourced from some of Australia’s
largest and most reputable timber
suppliers. Our suppliers are proactive and
work closely with various government
bodies to ensure the longevity and
sustainability of this precious specie, as
well as strictly abiding by forestry
regulations and laws.

bedside-tables.Name: Oak Azur Bedside
bedside-tables.Body:
Oak Azur bedside table is made from solid oak timber.

This item is crafted from solid timber making each piece beautifully unique with naturally occurring variations in wood grain, texture, colour, knots and other innate characteristics that are inherent to solid wood.

bedside-tables.Name: Bedsides-Recycled Australian Timber
bedside-tables.Body:
The images are of special orders we have made for customers. See what you like or not. Contact us with your requirements for a quote.

$695 is for a single drawer bedside measuring 450 x 400 x 500(h).

bedside-tables.Name: Teak Azur Bedside
bedside-tables.Body: Made from FSC certified solid, natural teak. Clean, straight lines. Features a drawer with no handle. What more would you want?

bedside-tables.Name: Bedside-solid recycled timber
bedside-tables.Body:
So a customer came into PFS with a magazine cutting showing the design of a bedside table she wanted quoted on made from recycled timber. When she received the quote, she could not believe the price given! The one in the magazine was made from veneer and priced at $1295...for one!

Want a different size or stain colour? Call or email for a quote.

bookcases.Name: Round Shelving Unit
bookcases.Body: This industrial standing round shelving unit is divided into 9 compartments so you can style any way you please.!

bookcases.Name: Up and Down Oak Vertical Shelves
bookcases.Body:
A vertical rack type 1 with 2 small trays and a single large tray is a storage rack that stands upright, with three levels of tray storage. The top level consists of a single large tray of small trays and the middle shelf holds 2 smaller trays. The small trays can be used to store small items and the large tray can be used to store larger items. As this rack is multi-purpose, it can be used in a living room, bedroom or hallway.

A 4 tier narrow shelf made of European Oak is a type of shelving unit that consists of three horizontal shelves stacked one above the other, as well as 2 smaller trays and 1 large tray which can be used to store a number of different items. The shelves are narrow, meaning they have limited width, making it great for small spaces. The shelves are made from European Oak, which is a type of hardwood which is known for its practical and aesthetic durability. Its distinctive rich colour and strength and natural beauty make this piece perfect for any interior space with its simplistic and modern design. The 4 tier design allows for efficient storage and organization in areas with limited space. As this rack is multi-purpose, it can be used in a living room, bedroom or hallway.

COMING IN MAY!

bookcases.Name: Up and Down Teak Vertical Shelves
bookcases.Body:
A vertical rack type 1 with 2 small trays and a single large tray is a storage rack that stands upright, with three levels of tray storage. The top level consists of a single large tray of small trays and the middle shelf holds 2 smaller trays. The small trays can be used to store small items and the large tray can be used to store larger items. As this rack is multi-purpose, it can be used in a living room, bedroom or hallway.

 

A 4 tier narrow shelf made of FSC Teak is a type of shelving unit that consists of three horizontal shelves stacked one above the other, as well as 2 smaller trays and 1 large tray which can be used to store a number of different items. The shelves are narrow, meaning they have limited width, making it great for small spaces. The shelves are made out of a FSC Teak, which is a type of hardwood which is known for its practical and aesthetic durability. Its distinctive rich colour and strength and natural beauty makes this pieces perfect for any interior space with its simplistic and modern design. The 4 tier design allows for efficient storage and organization in areas with limited space. As this rack is multi-purpose, it can be used in a living room, bedroom or hallway.

bookcases.Name: Teak Wooden Cube
bookcases.Body:
Natural Finish made from plantation teak fine sanded to show the stunning natural grain. Tropica is an Indonesian family-owned furniture business that uses teak remnants from large manufacturers, resulting in minimal waste of timber resource.

All Tropica teak is grown at Perhutani, a managed plantation that's controlled by the Indonesian government and is part of the Legal Wood Indonesia Alliance. This head-to-toe approach to wood uses everything including the roots, and offcuts from tree limbs to make a truly unique product. Each piece matches the specified size but is unique, with knots, burrs, holes and gnarling adding to the character.

bookcases.Name: Portable 3 Drawer Shelf Rack
bookcases.Body: Made from Spruce wood and aged metal, this portable shelf rack has a touch of an industrial feel. Suitable for your home office or as a statement piece to showcase all manner of home decor items.

bookcases.Name: Portable 2 Drawer Shelf Rack
bookcases.Body: Made from Spruce wood and aged metal, this portable shelf rack has a touch of an industrial feel. Suitable for your home office or as a statement piece to showcase all manner of home decor items.

bookcases.Body:
Reclaimed Australian hard wood. Fixed middle shelf with other shelves adjustable.
This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

bookcases.Name: Arundal Teak Bookshelf
bookcases.Body: The Arundal shelving unit is crafted from recycled teak wood with a natural finish. Each piece is designed to highlight the original timber detailing and patinas, creating a unique and one off item.

bookcases.Name: Open Long Bookcase
bookcases.Body: A very versatile design with an open back. Finished all the way around so it can be used as a room divider or up against a wall as a classic shelving unit.

bookcases.Name: Open Long Bookcase
bookcases.Body: A very versatile design with an open back. Finished all the way around so it can be used as a room divider or up against a wall as a classic shelving unit.

bookcases.Name: Railroad Open Bookshelf
bookcases.Body:
The Railroad Open Shelf unit is sourced from old railway sleepers with SVLK legally certified sustainably sourced wood and is coated with nitrocellulose lacquer.  The teak is in a rustic distressed finish but sanded to take out any fragments or splinters. The metal is coated iron in a black matte finish. The thick slab components portray the solid rustic function of this timber's previous use and will function in its new role for years to come.

Distance between shelves is 315mm. Each shelf measures 1200 x 330 x 45mm thick.

Check website for other Railroad pieces.

bookcases.Name: Portable Industrial Bookshelf
bookcases.Body: The Portable Industrial Bookshelf has been designed for this exact purpose.  Transport anything shelf worthy from room to room effortlessly. Crafted from sturdy mango wood, this piece featuring three-tiered shelving that can also be used to store and display objects, toys, and decor. This piece is ideal for modern, minimalist or industrially designed interiors. Available in two sizes.

bookcases.Name: Portable Industrial Bookshelf
bookcases.Body: The Portable Industrial Bookshelf has been designed for this exact purpose.  Transport anything shelf worthy from room to room effortlessly. Crafted from sturdy mango wood, this piece featuring three-tiered shelving that can also be used to store and display objects, toys, and decor. This piece is ideal for modern, minimalist or industrially designed interiors. Available in two sizes.

bookcases.Name: Circular Bookcase
bookcases.Body:
This is sure to become a signature piece in your home or office. The Circular Bookcase  has the benefit of being wheeled wherever you see fit in your space with ease. Sturdily framed with iron, use its beautifully handcrafted acacia wood shelves to display books, collectables, pot plants and more.

Distance between shelves 22cm

Hand made

  • Unit features an iron frame on castors
  • 4 shelves made from acacia wood - very sturdy
  • Solid cast iron
  • shelves fixed

bookcases.Name: Sublime Box Shelving Unit
bookcases.Body:
The Sublime Box Shelving Unit is made from powder-coated iron in a mottled metallic colour finish and reclaimed mixed hardwood sourced from decommissioned fishing boats from North Java.

The unit consists of two open box compartments for books, plants or trinkets which can be positioned inside the compartments or on top. You can create a feature wall using multiple sets, or a combination of size options. 

The boat wood will be distressed and show signs of its use on the high seas. Knots, burrs, bolt and nail holes and paint remnants of the brightly painted boat hulls may be noticeable on each piece. This is not considered a flaw, but a tattoo of the past experience of its previous life, warts and all!

Wall Mount plates in the vertical or horizontal format provided.

Wall plugs and screws not included.

bookcases.Name: Low Offset Bookshelf
bookcases.Body:
A very versatile design that can be used as a room divider or up against a wall. The staggered nature of the shelves, with opened and closed ends, will showcase all your homeware accessories and books.

This product is made locally from Australian timber (Vic.Ash). Because it is made locally we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

bookcases.Body:

bookcases.Body:

Made from Solid European White Oak it is designed to showcase the rich patterns and textures of this lovely cool wood, which make every piece unique.

The middle shelf is fixed with the two other shelves adjustable.

bookcases.Name: Prestige Wine Rack
bookcases.Body:
The exclusive and high-quality wine rack system PRESTIGE combines functionality with design. Give your wine cellar, your wine store or wine tasting room an elegant atmosphere in which your guests can thoroughly enjoy the tasting of wine. PRESTIGE will look amazing in your living space as well. The pre-assembled wine racks are elaborately constructed and hold your wine bottles securely. Thanks to the different shaped inserts of the different modules you can professionally organize your wine according to type, bottle shape and vintage. Our craftsmen manufacture PRESTIGE with much love for detail and accurately. The quality of the material and the passion of the craftsmen can be felt in every detail. All wine racks are manufactured accurate to the millimetre. For the 20 mm thick frame, plantation oak wood boards are used. Thanks to the shelf thickness PRESTIGE is extremely robust and stable. The insert shelves are 20mm thick and ensure an effortless storage of wine bottles in a horizontal, vertical or even a diagonal manner.

Locally made so we can offer custom sizes and timber stain colours

bookcases.Name: Tripod Book Shelf
bookcases.Body:

200cm width X 186cm height X 74cm depth  cm  Shelves:  Top-160 x 4 x 27 cm  Middle - 180 x 4 x 39 cm    Bottom 200 x 6.5 x 52 cm -  floor to shelf: 26.5 cm to next shelf: 45 cm to top shelf: 48 cm

bookcases.Name: Look Leaning Wall Shelf
bookcases.Body: French designer Damien Mazingue has delivered the Nako range, a clever blend of recycled boatwood timber & powdercoated metal.Simple clean lines provide clever storage shelves with the use of a metal frame central to the design highlighted by the timber panels to create functional furniture pieces with a light fresh approach.The Look open panel bookshelf consists of 3 open shelves which appear to be floating from the metal frame.The timber is mixed hardwoods sourced from old fishing vessels in North Java. Colour tones, knots, burrs and holes are evidence of it's previous use on the high seas and are not considered as faults. Remnants of colours can also vary from piece to piece and is part of the uniqueness of the range. Each item will match in the design and size but can differ in the colour variation of timbers and tones.

chest-of-drawers.Name: WA Marri Wideboy
chest-of-drawers.Body:
Marri timber is renowned for its distinctive
gum veins and characteristics which make
it one of the most unique timbers in the
world and the perfect timber for creating
fine handcrafted furniture.
Such characteristics are born from
withstanding extreme weather conditions
such as bushfires, severe storms and
prolonged periods of drought.
The Marri timber used in this product is
ethically sourced from some of Australia’s
largest and most reputable timber
suppliers. Our suppliers are proactive and
work closely with various government
bodies to ensure the longevity and
sustainability of this precious specie, as
well as strictly abiding by forestry
regulations and laws

clearance.Name: Riddling Rack
clearance.Body: The method of “riddling”, or turning/rotating champagne bottles was originally invented by a woman, Barbe-Nicole Clicquot Ponsardin (The Widow Cliquot) in the 19th Century. The Widow Cliquot invented the rack and the method of turning champagne bottles on mass in her cellars to increase the production of her cellars over that of her rivals. It is still practiced in many champagne houses today, although in recent years there has been a move by the large commercial producers to mechanized rotation. An expert cellar worker, it is said, can turn as many as fifty thousand bottles in a day, and these skilled employees carry on the tradition when making vintage champagne in France. By the 1830s, winemakers throughout the Champagne turned to standing A-frame racks called pipitres. The word means “desk,” but in fact they look like old-fashioned childhood easels. They can be found in cellars in any part of the world where sparkling wine is crafted. These hold 120 bottles

coffee-table.Name: Up and Down Oak Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body:
The UP & DOWN coffee table with two trays made of European Oak timber for indoor use is a piece of furniture that is typically used in living rooms or other indoor spaces. The table is made of oak wood, which is a durable and strong material that is known for its natural resistance to rot and decay, features an oak detailing on the corners and is finished with a water based finish. The tray feature as a removable top surface, which can be used for serving drinks or food, holding magazines or books, or as a decorative piece. The oak wood finish gives a natural and elegant look to the table and it can be paired with other oak wood furniture to create a cohesive look in a room.

The European White Oak a type of hardwood known for its durability and attractive grain pattern. The table is equipped with 2 large removable trays on the top surface, for holding items such as books, magazines, remotes or drinks making it ideal for a living room or sitting area, as its simple and elegant design makes it ideal for any space in the house. The 2 trays are designed to fit perfectly on any shelf in any direction with ease. Featuring FSC Teak biscuits in the corners creates simple interest in an elegant piece of hand crafted furniture.

Available in three sizes. The smaller two only have one removable tray.

STOCK AVAILABLE IN MAY.

The table is equipped with 2 large removable trays on the top surface, for holding items such as books, magazines, remotes or drinks making it ideal for a living room or sitting area, as its simple and elegant design makes it ideal for any space in the house. The 2 trays are designed to fit perfectly on any shelf in any direction with ease. Featuring European White Oak biscuits in the corners creates simple interest in an elegant piece of hand crafted furniture.

Three sizes available. The smaller two have only one removable tray.

coffee-table.Name: Capiz Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body: Embellished with real seashells, our stunning diamond patterned coffee table joins our new line of Capiz furniture. Beautifully and carefully placed shell pieces radiates an exotic and elegant vibe that is certain to enrich your decorated interior.

coffee-table.Name: Capiz Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body: Embellished with real seashells, our stunning diamond patterned coffee table joins our new line of Capiz furniture. Beautifully and carefully placed shell pieces radiates an exotic and elegant vibe that is certain to enrich your decorated interior.

coffee-table.Name: Puzzle Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body:
The Woody Puzzle Coffee Table is pieced together utilising Teak Root offcuts and remnants to create a unique showpiece.

These are glued, screwed & bolted together producing the "Puzzle" Coffee Table being unique viewed from various angles. In doing so the offcuts are turned into functional furniture pieces and are saved from landfills.

Good for you- great for the environment! Natural knots, burrs and gnarls only enhance this piece and will be the focal point of your living space. The Puzzle Coffee Table can be used as is, or you can add a glass tabletop (not supplied). The rubber stoppers & the pre-drilled holes are supplied, however.

6mm toughened safety glass as pictured add $265.

coffee-table.Body:

coffee-table.Name: Coffee Table 2 Drawer
coffee-table.Body: A bit of old-world charm influence. Made from fruitwood with a 'smoke house' finish.

coffee-table.Name: Red Gum Burl Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body:
The tables are made from the Burl of old river red gum trees in the Koondrook state forest, surrounding the Murray River. Each of these burls were cut down for the health of the tree between 20 and 40 years ago, by a licensed arborist. After slabbing, the burl slabs have been left to dry for 5-10 years before being made into furniture. 

Red Gum Burls of any size larger than 50cms in diameter are increasingly rare to find. In the Koondrook state forest, there are many Red Gums over 400 years old, these larger burls often come off trees that are at least 100 years old.

The legs used are black powder-coated metal.

MADE IN MELBOURNE!

coffee-table.Name: Red Gum Burl Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body:

coffee-table.Name: Circ Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body:
Made from Australian Oak with two felt-lined drawers, full extension runners, dovetailed joins and a timeless design that would suit a modern or classic home. Matching lamp/side tables available.

Australian Oak Timber is a premium hardwood that encompasses species which grow in the mountainous areas of Tasmania. Our Australian Oak is hand selected at the mill to ensure it's of the highest grade and quality, which allows us to produce stunning timber furniture. We ensure that our selection of Australian Oak has a consistent natural light brown colour, with an abundance of unique & natural features which includes hues of colour varying from straw to reddish brown with intermediated shades of cream and pink. The beauty of Australian Oak Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same. The gum veins and natural characteristics seen in Australian Oak timber are not found in any other hardwood timbers.

coffee-table.Name: Railroad Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body:
The Railroad Coffee Table is sourced from old railway sleepers with SVLK legal certified sustainably sourced wood, and is coated with a nitrocellulose lacquer.  

The teak is in a rustic distressed finish, but sanded to take out any fragments or splinters. The metal is coated iron in a black matte finish. The thick slab components portray the solid rustic function of this timbers previous use, and will function in its new role for years to come.

coffee-table.Name: Railroad Round Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body: The Railroad round Coffee Table is sourced from old railway sleepers with SVLK legal certified sustainably sourced wood, and is coated with a nitrocellulose lacquer.  The teak is in a rustic distressed finish, but sanded to take out any fragments or splinters. The metal is coated iron in a black matte finish. The thick slab components portray the solid rustic function of this timbers previous use, and will function in its new role for years to come.

coffee-table.Name: Flore Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body: The Flore Coffee Table is an art deco inspired piece. Combining premium materials with beautiful simplicity. The Flore is constructed from reclaimed timber with metal edging on the top and bottom

coffee-table.Name: Caprice Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body: Open slatted design with clean lines.  Made from recycled Fir Wood.

coffee-table.Name: Inverted Iron and Wood Coffee Table
coffee-table.Body: Our Inverted Iron and Wooden Coffee Table is a beautiful addition to rustic interiors and outdoor spaces inspired by far away, exotic places. consoles.Name: Up and Down Oak Console
consoles.Body:
The UP & DOWN console table with one tray made of oak timber for indoor use is a piece of furniture that is typically used in living rooms or other indoor spaces. The table is made of oak wood, which is a durable and strong material that is known for its natural resistance to rot and decay, features a Teak detailing on the corners and is finished with a water based finish. The tray feature is a removable top surface, which can be used for serving drinks or food, holding magazines or books, or as a decorative piece. The oak wood finish gives a natural and elegant look to the table and it can be paired with other oak wood furniture to create a cohesive look in a room.

 

The Console Table features 1 shelve. The European White Oak a type of hardwood known for its durability and attractive grain pattern. The light weight and sturdiness of the console table ensures it is durability in any indoor environment. The table is equipped with 1 large removable trays on the top surface, for holding items such as books, magazines, remotes or drinks making it ideal for a living room or sitting area, as its simple and elegant design makes it ideal for any space in the house. The 1 tray is designed to fit perfectly on on the unit in any direction with ease. Featuring FSC Teak biscuits in the corners creates simple interest in an elegant piece of hand crafted furniture.

COMING IN MAY!

The light weight and sturdiness of the console table ensures it is durability in any indoor environment. The table is equipped with 1 large removable trays on the top surface, for holding items such as books, magazines, remotes or drinks making it ideal for a living room or sitting area, as its simple and elegant design makes it ideal for any space in the house. consoles.Name: Kova Console
consoles.Body:

Features three doors and two drawers.

consoles.Name: Rustic Hall Table
consoles.Body: Classic, timeless design made from reclaimed Oak. It features five drawers with aged brass knobs. The depth of this piece being only 300m, makes it ideal for narrow spaces.

consoles.Name: Tika Console
consoles.Body:
The Tika Console is made solely from Teak Root which ensures that each piece is one of a kind.

Although the table is uniquely shaped the sizing will sit within the dimensions noted. Each piece includes the 8mm tempered glass top and rubber stoppers.

The Tropica range features a selection of an Indonesian family-owned furniture business that uses teak remnants from large manufacturers, resulting in minimal wastage of timber resources.

The teak is grown at Perhutani, a managed plantation that's controlled by the Indonesian government and is part of the Legal Wood Indonesia Alliance. This head-to-toe approach to wood uses everything including the roots, and offcuts from tree limbs to make a truly unique product.

Each piece matches the specified size while staying unique, with knots, burrs, holes and character. Some pieces are sanded smooth to highlight the beautiful luster and colour of teak and some are more rustic with a brushed, lightly distressed finish.

consoles.Name: French Inspired Iron Console
consoles.Variant Name: W 140 x D 400 x H 940 mm
consoles.Body: The curved base of this console table has intricate scrollwork that elevates its sleek and elegant style with a floral and leaf design. The metal base has an antique white finish that's paired with a rectangular wood tabletop. The open design of the base and mixed materials of this console lend an easygoing, airy element that's ideal for an entryway or foyer.

consoles.Body: Made from recycled timber and the influence of small apothecary drawers, each drawer functions to modern day size. This console has six drawers.  Finish: Recycled Fir with aged metal legs and handles.

Australian Oak Timber is a premium hardwood that encompasses species which grow in the mountainous areas of Tasmania. Our Australian Oak is hand selected at the mill to ensure it's of the highest grade and quality, which allows us to produce stunning timber furniture. We ensure that our selection of Australian Oak has a consistent natural light brown colour, with an abundance of unique & natural features which includes hues of colour varying from straw to reddish brown with intermediated shades of cream and pink. The beauty of Australian Oak Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same. The gum veins and natural characteristics seen in Australian Oak timber are not found in any other hardwood timbers.

consoles.Name: Railroad Console

The Railroad Console is sourced from old railway sleepers with SVLK legal certified sustainably sourced wood, and is coated with a nitrocellulose lacquer.  The teak is in a rustic distressed finish, but sanded to take out any fragments or splinters. The metal is coated iron in a black matte finish. The thick slab components portray the solid rustic function of this timbers previous use, and will function in its new role for years to come.

Check the website for other Railroad pieces.

consoles.Body: Another take on the Industrial theme of home furniture. The Roccoco combines textured, recycled Elm with a beaten solid iron frame.

consoles.Name: Sublime Console Table
consoles.Body:
The Sublime Console Table consists of three half-moon shelf tiers in a geometric fan pattern. It is made from powder-coated iron in a mottled metallic colour finish, Mindi wood in a satin black finish and reclaimed mixed hardwood sourced from decommissioned fishing boats from North Java. 

The boat wood timber tops will be distressed and show signs of its use on the high seas. Knots, burrs, bolt and nail holes and paint remnants of the brightly painted boat hulls may be noticeable on each piece. This is not considered a flaw, but a tattoo of the past experience of its previous life, warts and all! 

Reclaimed, recycled and reborn- embrace life sustainably, one step at a time. Join us on this journey.

consoles.Name: Teak 3 Drawer Kubus Console
consoles.Body: The Teak Kubus console with 3 drawers is perfect for narrow spaces. The exposed dove tails joinery creates an exquisitely strong detail with classically minimalist lines and the traditional and organic feel of solid teak wood. Crafted from solid teak timber that has been sourced from reclaimed and plantation wood in Indonesia. The Teak is unfinished and only polished causing the natural oils to rise to the surface to enhance its natural beauty. Each piece beautifully unique with naturally occurring variations in wood grain, texture, colour, knots and other innate characteristics that are inherent to solid wood.

consoles.Name: AFT Console with Storage
consoles.Body:

consoles.Name: Recycled Timber Console
consoles.Body:
When you combine recycled timber with a modern design you will find that the piece will last the test of time. PFS has been making furniture using reclaimed timber from old buildings for more than 30 years. The sad thing is that the supply of such timber is becoming increasingly more difficult to source.
No two pieces are the same, so if you like what you see either on-line or in-store...it's yours for the buying! If it's not quite right, ring or email with your ideas.

Our Messmate is hand selected at the mill to ensure its of the highest grade and quality, which allows us to produce stunning timber furniture. We ensure that our selection of Messmate Timber our selection of Messmate Timber has a consistent natural light brown colour , with an abundance of unique & natural features.
The beauty of Australian Messmate Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same.
This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

Metal inlay covers cracks and adds to the individuality - each table is a unique art piece to treasure for a lifetime.

desks.Name: Bail Stretch Study Desk
desks.Body: As the name suggests, this desk stretches from 1400 to 1520 and everything in between. Made from solid American Ash timber and solid satin brass hardware. Featuring a fluted drawer and soft closing extension runners. Also a rear cable hole.

desks.Name: Sit-Stand Desk
desks.Body:
The Sit-Stand electric height adjustable desk is available in three finishes and two sizes. The tops are melamine and the frames are powder coated. This single motor desk is designed to fit into your stylish office decor, while providing easy to use ergonomic function. 

The desk is equipped with a load capacity of 70kg and will easily carry monitors, CPUs, and any other accessories required for your workspace. The desk adjusts with built in controls, at a speed of 25mm/sec, which is fast enough to keep your work momentum going while keeping you energised by alternating your work position, with the addition of four memory settings for quick adjustments. 

The desk also includes a stationary drawer and two USB and one mini USB charger ports to help you stay organised. The desk has a very low power consumption and for safety includes an anti-collision sensor to ensure the desk won't pinch or trap surrounding items. 

Easy to assemble, easy to keep clean, safe, and ergonomic, the Sit-Stand Desk is an investment in your workspace and your efficiency.

Assembly Instructions

desks.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Frame Desk
desks.Body: The Frame desk is compact and perfect for small spaces. The sleek drawers provide convenient storage for essential documents and stationery and make it ideal as a console or workspace.

desks.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Frame Desk
desks.Body: The Frame desk is compact and perfect for small spaces. The sleek drawers provide convenient storage for essential documents and stationery and make it ideal as a console or workspace.

desks.Name: Nalu Desk
desks.Body: Nalu desk is made from solid mindi wood with aged effect. To make the structure the wood has been curved to round the ends. The wood has also been curved in different areas to form the shape of the top and draws to store your essentials. To add a trendy touch the front is made from hand-braided rattan. It is an eco-friendly designer piece as the wood comes from a responsible felling and sustainable forests. Natural timbers may exhibit variances in grain colour and texture sometimes visible knots filling and butterfly joints will be evident and it can change colour with age. These variations are normal characteristics of all timber species.

desks.Name: Solid Timber Keyboard Desk
desks.Body:
Custom-made Vic Ash Desk with removable keyboard insert.  This was a special order for a customer who lived in a small apartment and wanted the option for a study desk to double up as a console table when not in use.

Because it is made locally from timber, we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

desks.Name: AFT Chem Desk
desks.Body:
The Chem 3 Drawer Desk features reclaimed timber with metal legs.  While maintaining the design of small apothecary drawers, each drawer functions to modern day size with 3 handles wide.  It is a natural product, so some colour variation can occur.  Part of our AFT industrial range.

Dimensions: 1400 x 600 x 780mm (h)

desks.Name: Cuadrado Desk
desks.Body: Cuadrado Desk made from sustainable fruitwood and metal legs.  This is a natural product so some colour variation can occur.  Also available with wooden legs (see photos).

desks.Name: Cuadrado Desk
desks.Body: Cuadrado Desk made from sustainable fruitwood and metal legs.  This is a natural product so some colour variation can occur.  Also available with wooden legs (see photos).

desks.Name: SLH Reclaimed Boatwood Desk
desks.Body: Office / student desk made of reclaimed boat timber and metal iron frame. This is a solid industrial style desk that will add an urban warehouse feel to your work space

desks.Name: SLH Office Desk
desks.Body: Work desk comprises of a slim line sleek powdercoated metal frame in a mottled black grey metallic finish in a low sheen. The timber trim is a blend of mixed hardwoods sourced from old fishing vessels which provides a stylish and unique detail to the desktop. The central hole at the back of the desk allows all connection cords to connect to your devices allowing the unit to buffer directly against a wall. You can match this up with the SLH filing cabinet to complete your workspace. Please note each unit will comprise of unique timbers. Colour tones and variation, knots, burrs and imperfections are part of the unique finish.

desks.Name: Recycled Timber Desk
desks.Body:
This was a custom order for someone who wanted...a bit of this and a bit of that! She liked the desk we had on display but wanted the legs changed to a dining table we had.
This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

desks.Name: Recycled Timber Desk
desks.Body:
Your working environment doesn't have to be clinical, stark and boring. Consider a desk made from solid timber, actually from recycled solid timber.
This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

Just letting you know that timber prices have increased by as much as 30% for local timbers. This reflects the increase on all locally made furniture.

desks.Name: Recycled Timber 2 Drawer Desk
desks.Body:
Two drawer desk with waterfall sides. Shown here with optional pencil and filing drawer on castors...$765.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

desks.Body:

Use to hold papers and supplies on a desktop, to hold accessories on a wardrobe shelf, or perhaps to organize washcloths or toiletries in a bathroom. These offer a smart and stylish way to provide easy-access storage.

Dimensions: Large: W48 x D33.5 x H12 cm, Medium: W24 x D33 x H12 cm, Small: W24 x D22 x H16 cm

dining-room.Name: Curved Back Dining Chair
dining-room.Body:
As you all know, dining chairs come in all shapes and sizes and depending on what the 'fashion' is at the moment. Or should I say...'What you see on the Block', it can be quite daunting what design to pick. Apart from 'looks', chairs need to be comfortable, functional and compliment the dining table they are to go with. Balance for me is the key factor. Balance with the size of the table. Balance with surrounding colour schemes. And balance with your budget. Good chairs don't come cheap...you definitely get what you paid for. Do it right the first time. Pick the right design, fabric, leg stain and you won't regret it!

These chairs need 1.5 metres of fabric that needs to be added to $385.

dining-table.Name: Belfort Double Extension Table
dining-table.Body:
Add a touch of class to your dining space with the Belfort double extension dining table. Designed for entertaining; The Belfort can be extended from 2.1 metres to up to 3.1 metres in length.  The extension mechanism is smooth and easy to adjust. Made from solid fruitwood; The timber has a beautiful, warm colour. The Belfort will be a show piece in any dining room.

Three Lengths in One.

The double extension table design gives you the flexibility of using it in three different configurations. The table closed is 2.1m long, it then extends to 2.6m and then again to 3.1m.

Smart Double Extension Table System

The Belfort tables extension system is effortless to use. Switching between lengths is fast and easy. Simply pop out the leaves and the table will move on its smooth metal rollers.

Fruitwood Construction

This table is made from solid fruit wood timber. This type of wood is renowned for its beautiful texture and is made to last. The Belfort is finished with a clear lacquer. The extension mechanism is made from durable steel.

dining-table.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Bok Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
Just like its matching chair, the Bok dining table has become one of our signature designs. Its airy shape yet rock-solid construction make this piece a timeless and remarkable design to enjoy for years to come.

Also available in Teak.

Made of solid oak with a hardwax oil finish.

dining-table.Name: RAT Danish Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
You've heard of a Cheese Danish, Apricot Danish and an Apple Danish well now there is a RAT DANISH...dining table that is. Made completely from recycled Australian hardwood, this classic dining table is greatly influenced by an era that has made a huge comeback in home furniture design. The use of solid recycled timber is what sets the RAT DANISH from its competitors.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

Just letting you know that timber prices have increased by as much as 30% for local timbers. This reflects the increase on all locally made furniture.

dining-table.Name: Kleo Round Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
Another creation from Kleo...

KLEO is located in Yogyakarta, Indonesia, since 2006. Their modern interior design products are made with ingredients of French design and Javanese craftsmanship merged with recycled boat wood and iron. KLEO furniture is using sustainable processes and low maintenance materials.

All of their furniture is created from recycled boat wood. KLEO is known among fisher folks along the northern coast of Java because of their generous offers to buy boat wrecks that otherwise would litter the coastline and go to waste.

The boats have served coastal communities well for 40-50 years. The wood is worn and dirty and smeared in thick layers of old paint. But, miraculously, this is where the beauty of their products begins. By sanding  the surfaces, the wood is given new life, and paint turns into colorful marbled patterns and mosaics.

"It is the patterns, dents, scars and natural lines that tell the story of our products’ journey from ocean to homes, which makes every individual KLEO piece unique"

The mix with iron highlights the artistic beauty of the recycled boat wood. All of their wood is SVLK certified to meet global market demands. They use only recycled wood.

KLEO use Powder Coating for iron. This gives a softer texture and improved rust and scratch protection. The process is certified as more environmentally friendly; there is little product waste; and, the large amount of water required is reused.

dining-table.Body:

dining-table.Name: Amaira Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
The Amaira dining table is lovingly made by artisans  from wooden panels recycled from decommissioned  vintage Indian trucks.

Each one is unique, as each has had different layers of fresh paint over the years during each  Divali festival.

When sanded back, different colours are revealed, and a unique artwork is formed.

Metal iron legs fold up for ease of transport.

dining-table.Name: Raas Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
The Raas NERO dining table is a beautiful original old table from the 1950's rejuvenated by artisans.

Metal inlay covers cracks and adds to the individuality - each table is a unique art piece to treasure for a lifetime.

Metal iron legs fold up for ease of transport.

dining-table.Name: Edito Extension Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
French designer Damien Mazingue has delivered the Edito range, a clever blend of recycled boatwood timber and powdercoated metal.  The timber is a mixture of hardwood timbers sourced from old fishing vessels from North Java. Colour tones, knots, burrs and holes are evidence of it's previous use on the high seas and are not considered as faults. Remnants of colours can also vary from piece to piece and is part of the uniqueness of the range. Each item will match in the design and size but can differ in the colour variation of timbers and tones.

This table measures 1600 x 900 when closed and has two independent end extension leaves making it 2080 or 2560 in length.

dining-table.Name: Angled 'U' Base Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
Messmate is one of those timbers that is known for its feature grain. And with most solid timber tables...no two are the same. That's why when you come into PFS and find a table you like, that's the one you will get!

This particular design is a take on the classic 'U' base. Rather than being vertical, the 'U' is angled out.
This product is made locally from Messmate. Because it is made locally, we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

dining-table.Name: Angled 'U' Base Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
Messmate is one of those timbers that is known for its feature grain. And with most solid timber tables...no two are the same. That's why when you come into PFS and find a table you like, that's the one you will get!

This particular design is a take on the classic 'U' base. Rather than being vertical, the 'U' is angled out.
This product is made locally from Messmate. Because it is made locally, we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

dining-table.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Round Dining Table
dining-table.Body:
With its rounded edges, this round dining table adds a warm and original touch to your space.
Ethnicraft uses tried and tested timber species to match their design philosophy where colour, grain and texture are its main attractions! With its timber sourced from Europe and designed in Belgium to the exacting international trends and standards, the furniture pieces from Ethnicraft Oak range are timeless and will enhance any space. To highlight the beauty of natural solid wood, Ethnicraft specifically chose European oak wood with naturally occurring splits and knots to make each piece unique

quality, which allows us to produce
stunning timber furniture. We ensure that

consistent natural light brown colour, with
an abundance of unique & natural
features.
The beauty of Australian Messmate
Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are

timbers, making our product incredibly

entertainment-units.Name: Rattan Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body: Natural Oak wood and rattan sliding door media unit.  Part of a range of rattan furniture available.

entertainment-units.Name: Kali Open Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body:
The Kali Open TV Unit with Antique Brass Finish legs is part of our rustic Tropica collection and suits a wide variety of settings perfectly. The teak surface is in a distressed finish & will have burrs, knots and natural indentations and flaws evident.

Tropica is an Indonesian family-owned furniture business that uses teak remnants from large manufacturers, resulting in minimal wastage of timber resources.

All Tropica teak is grown at Perhutani, a managed plantation that's controlled by the Indonesian government and is part of the Legal Wood Indonesia Alliance. This head-to-toe approach to wood uses everything including the roots, and offcuts from tree limbs to make a truly unique product. Each piece matches the specified size but is unique, with knots, burrs, holes, and gnarling adding to the character.

entertainment-units.Name: Black Rattan Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body: Natural Oak wood stained black with rattan sliding doors and an adjustable shelf.

entertainment-units.Name: Sublime TV Stand
entertainment-units.Body:
The Sublime TV Stand with two matching side tables is made from reclaimed mixed hardwood timber, mindi wood in a black satin stain finish and powder-coated metal frame in a mottled metallic colour finish.

The TV Stand has two levels for ample storage of devices, and the matching side tables are made from Mindi wood in a satin black colour stain. These tuck comfortably within the TV stand frame or can be removed to use next to your lounge or armchair separately to the unit.

The mixed hardwood timbers may display paint remnants of the brightly coloured ship hulls of its previous use and will vary in wood tone colours. Evidence of knots, burrs, nail and bolt holes may be evident as a tattoo of its previous use on the high seas and are not considered as flaws.

Reclaimed, recycled and reborn- embrace life sustainably, one step at a time. Join us on this journey.

entertainment-units.Name: Irvin Entertainment Unit
entertainment-units.Body: Irvin is a TV unit constructed of solid wattle timber with a metal legs and a detail on the doors. Natural timbers may exhibit variances in grain colour and texture sometimes visible knots filling and butterfly joints will be evident and it can change colour with age. These variations are normal characteristics of all timber species.

entertainment-units.Name: Circ Entertainment Unit
entertainment-units.Body:
Made from Australian Oak with two deep felt-lined drawers, full extension runners, dovetailed joins, adjustable centre shelf and a timeless design that would suit a modern or classic home. Available in two sizes

Australian Oak Timber is a premium hardwood that encompasses species which grow in the mountainous areas of Tasmania. Our Australian Oak is hand selected at the mill to ensure it's of the highest grade and quality, which allows us to produce stunning timber furniture. We ensure that our selection of Australian Oak has a consistent natural light brown colour, with an abundance of unique & natural features which includes hues of colour varying from straw to reddish brown with intermediated shades of cream and pink. The beauty of Australian Oak Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same. The gum veins and natural characteristics seen in Australian Oak timber are not found in any other hardwood timbers.

entertainment-units.Name: Circ Entertainment Unit
entertainment-units.Body:
Made from Australian Oak with two deep felt-lined drawers, full extension runners, dovetailed joins, adjustable centre shelf and a timeless design that would suit a modern or classic home. Available in two sizes

Australian Oak Timber is a premium hardwood that encompasses species which grow in the mountainous areas of Tasmania. We ensure that our selection of Australian Oak has a consistent natural light brown colour, with an abundance of unique & natural features which includes hues of colour varying from straw to reddish brown with intermediated shades of cream and pink. The beauty of Australian Oak Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same. The gum veins and natural characteristics seen in Australian Oak timber are not found in any other hardwood timbers.

entertainment-units.Name: Railroad Extendable TV Unit
entertainment-units.Body:
The Railroad tv unit is sourced from old railway sleepers with SVLK legal certified sustainably sourced wood and is coated with nitrocellulose lacquer.  The teak is in a rustic distressed finish but sanded to take out any fragments or splinters. The metal is coated iron in a black matte finish. The thick slab components portray the solid rustic function of this timber's previous use and will function in its new role for years to come. This unit has two separate slabs which can be adjusted to the desired length you require.

Check the website for other Railroad pieces.

entertainment-units.Name: Delsie Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body:
Delsie entertainment unit is 100% handmade and is constructed of solid acacia wood with a natural finish. In addition, it has decorative detail on the doors with different depths which are also handmade. The legs are metal painted black. A designer piece that, in addition to having character, has a unique personality. Natural timbers may exhibit variances in grain, colour and texture, sometimes visable knots, filling and butterfly joints will be evident and it can change colour with age. These variations are normal characteristics of all timber species.

Sideboard also available in this design (see website).

Dimensions: 1470 x 380 x 500mm (h)

entertainment-units.Name: Curve Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body: Mixing perforated powder coated iron & recycled hardwood timbers from old fishing vessels sourced from North Java, this tv unit with its curved form is sure to impress. Each unit is unique showing remnants of paint, nail holes & gnarled timber showing evidence of its past use. Reformed & recycled and ready for your living space! Part of a "Curve" range (see website).

entertainment-units.Name: Recycled Timber TV Stand
entertainment-units.Body:
Be a little creative with your own design, you can come up with something as simple as staining the drawers as a contrast to the rest of the unit.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

entertainment-units.Name: Ethnicraft Teak Frame TV Stand

entertainment-units.Name: Ethnicraft Teak Frame TV Stand

entertainment-units.Name: Nako Reclaimed Boatwood Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body: This media unit showcases a clever blend of recycled boat-wood timber & powder-coated metal. Geometric forms provide clever storage compartments with the use of a metal frame central to the design highlighted with timber panels to create functional furniture pieces with a light fresh approach. The tv unit consists of 2 centrally located pull out drawers with 4 storage shelf compartments on either side, one wood and the other metal shelf frame. The timber is a mixture of hardwood timbers sourced from old fishing vessels from North Java. Colour tones, knots, burrs and holes are evidence of its previous use on the high seas and are not considered as faults.

entertainment-units.Name: WA Marri Media Unit
entertainment-units.Body:
Marri timber is renowned for its distinctive gum veins and characteristics which make it one of the most unique timbers in the world and the perfect timber for creating fine handcrafted furniture.Â  Â 
Such characteristics are born from withstanding extreme weather conditions such as bushfires, severe storms and prolonged periods of drought.Â  Â 
The Marri timber used in the production of this product is ethically sourced from some of Australiaâ€™s largest and most reputable timber suppliers. Our suppliers are proactive and work closely with various government bodies to ensure the longevity and sustainability of this precious specie, as well as strictly abiding by forestry regulations and laws.Â Â Â

entertainment-units.Name: RAT 5 Entertainment Unit

It has three drawers with full extension runners, dovetail joins and generous cavity space for all of your components.

This product can be locally made to your specifications. Ring or email with your requirements.

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

floating-shelves.Body: This elegant Wall shelf, crafted from European Oak, is the perfect solution for extra shelving needs. Featuring simple, clean lines, they can be aligned or stacked on the wall in your preferred combinations. Comes with a flush-mounted stainless steel keyhole bracket for easy installation. Available in three sizes. Now also available in Black.

floating-shelves.Name: Sublime Box Shelving Unit
floating-shelves.Body:
The Sublime Box Shelving Unit is made from powder-coated iron in a mottled metallic colour finish and reclaimed mixed hardwood sourced from decommissioned fishing boats from North Java.

The unit consists of two open box compartments for books, plants or trinkets which can be positioned inside the compartments or on top. You can create a feature wall using multiple sets, or a combination of size options. 

The boat wood will be distressed and show signs of its use on the high seas. Knots, burrs, bolt and nail holes and paint remnants of the brightly painted boat hulls may be noticeable on each piece. This is not considered a flaw, but a tattoo of the past experience of its previous life, warts and all!

Wall Mount plates in the vertical or horizontal format provided.

Wall plugs and screws not included.

floating-shelves.Name: Mango Wood Floating Shelf
floating-shelves.Body: Mango wood shelf with a distressed baltic finish.  Available in 3 sizes.

floating-shelves.Name: Mango Wood Floating Shelf
floating-shelves.Body: Mango wood shelf with a distressed baltic finish.  Available in 3 sizes.

floating-shelves.Name: Mango Wood Floating Shelf
floating-shelves.Body: Mango wood shelf with a distressed baltic finish.  Available in 3 sizes.

floating-shelves.Name: Sublime Wall Shelf
floating-shelves.Body:
The Sublime Wall Shelf is made from powder-coated iron in a mottled metallic colour finish and reclaimed mixed hardwood sourced from decommissioned fishing boats from North Java. The unit consists of a large quadrant patterned sphere as a textural backdrop and powder-coated metallic frame to store paperbacks. You can create a feature wall using multiple sets, or use individually.

The boat wood will be distressed and show signs of it's use on the high seas. Knots, burrs, bolt and nail holes and paint remnants of the brightly painted boat hulls may be noticeable from piece to piece. This is not considered a flaw, but a tattoo of the past experience of its previous life, warts and all! 

Reclaimed, recycled and reborn- embrace life sustainably, one step at a time. Join us on this journey.

floating-shelves.Name: Industrial Floating Wall Shelves
floating-shelves.Body:
A clever blend of recycled boat-wood timber & powder-coated metal. Geometric forms provide clever storage compartments with the use of a metal frame central to the design highlighted with timber panels to create functional furniture pieces with a light fresh approach. This set of shelves consists of 5 box frame shapes which have eyelet sockets at the back of the wood shelf frame, or can be hung using the metal box frame. Placed together on the wall, they make a versatile geometric storage display. The timber is a mixture of hardwood timbers sourced from old fishing vessels from North Java. Colour tones, knots, burrs and holes are evidence of its previous use on the high seas and are not considered as faults.

The price listed is for the set of 5 frames.

Dimensions Width (cm) Depth (cm) Height (cm)
Shelf 1 65 15 40
Shelf 2 50 15 35
Shelf 3 40 15 30
Shelf 4 20 15 35
Shelf 5 25 15 75

floating-shelves.Body: You will not find a stronger and easier to install floating shelf in the market. A patented track mounting system makes for easy installation. The tilt adjustment keeps the shelf level and the shadowline at the rear hides any uneven walls.

clothes-racks.Name: Wall Panel Hat and Coat Rack
clothes-racks.Body: It would be a shame to cover up the printed work on the panel with hats and coats. Made from fruitwood with anchor points at the back for hanging on a wall.

clothes-racks.Name: Driftwood Ladder
clothes-racks.Body:
Natural Finish made from plantation teak fine sanded to show the stunning natural grain.

Tropica is an Indonesian family-owned furniture business that uses teak remnants from large manufacturers, resulting in minimal wastage of timber resource.

All Tropica teak is grown at Perhutani, a managed plantation that's controlled by the Indonesian government and is part of the Legal Wood Indonesia Alliance. This head-to-toe approach to wood uses everything including the roots, and offcuts from tree limbs to make a truly unique product. Each piece matches the specified size but is unique, with knots, burrs, holes and gnarling adding to the character.

Some pieces are sanded smooth to highlight the beautiful luster of teak while other pieces are more rustic with a lightly distressed finish.

Tropica furniture is perfect for the home, but has also been used in multiple hospitality fit-outs and display home projects.

clothes-racks.Name: Krysia Room Divider
clothes-racks.Body: The Krysia room divider is carefully crafted from natural rattan, that is curved and braided by hand. Designed in Spain, each piece is unique and fully foldable for storage. The rattan paneling is braided into a geometric pattern to highlight the beauty of this natural material

clothes-racks.Name: Ship's Rope Ladder
clothes-racks.Body: Every now and then, sadly more then than now, I come across some interesting and unique pieces. This is definitely one of them. It's a rope ladder salvaged from an Indian ship back in the 50's. What would you do with it and or where would I put it?...you may ask. I'll leave that to your imagination.

clothes-racks.Name: Nostalgic Coat Rack
clothes-racks.Body: Nostalgic coat rack with a round mirror which is constructed of black painted metal frame with ash wood shelves in ash plated MDF.

clothes-racks.Name: Chartres Hall Stand
clothes-racks.Body: Functional statement piece as you walk into your home.  Made from reclaimed Asian timber with a weathered grey finish, 6 coat/hat hooks, 2 drawers and cupboard below bench seating

clothes-racks.Name: Bamboo Ladder
clothes-racks.Body: The Bamboo Ladder is the perfect accompaniment for the contemporary home. Perfect for magazines, or towels, it can be a great space saver & declutter any room.  The Bamboo Ladders are finished in black to suit any colour scheme, and the design is simple.

clothes-racks.Name: Coat/Hat Stand
clothes-racks.Body: Stunning wood furniture in your home brings a freshness and striking style. This teak branch coat rack, certainly is a statement piece and will add detail to a space in your home. Beautiful teak wood has been polished and shaped to make a circular base and a single slim branch winds up making the body. Slim pegs are attached to the body, giving a handy place for you to hang, coats, scarves and any other clothing items.

clothes-racks.Name: Coat Hooks
clothes-racks.Body: Perfect for an entry hall or affixed behind a bedroom door, these coat/hat hangers have a recycled teak back board with aged metal hooks.

clothes-racks.Name: Coat Hooks
clothes-racks.Body: Perfect for an entry hall or affixed behind a bedroom door, these coat/hat hangers have a recycled teak back board with aged metal hooks.

clothes-racks.Name: Corridor Clothes Rack
clothes-racks.Body: The Corridor Clothes Rack and umbrella stand is a versatile piece for the entrance hall, or for use in bedrooms with minimal storage space or inbuilt wardrobes. It is made from reclaimed mixed hardwood timber from decommissioned fishing boats from the northern coastline of Java, and powder coated metal in a mottled metallic colour finish. The boat owners are paid for the decommissioned hull providing them with much-needed income to put towards a new vessel. The timber is stripped on-site, and transported to the factory to produce a new lease of functionality to the precious timber resource. Each piece will differ in wood tone and colour showing evidence of it's previous function on the high seas. Knots, burrs, bolt and nail holes and paint remnants of the brightly painted hulls may be noticeable on each piece. This is not considered a flaw, but a tattoo of the past experience of its previous life, warts and all! Reclaimed, recycled and reborn- embrace life sustainably, one step at a time. Join us on this journey.

frontpage.Name: Mustard Skinny Locker
frontpage.Body:
The Skinny Locker wants to help. She'll keep your stuff neat and tidy. Standing alone or in paired with friends The Skinny is elegant, beautiful and practical.

Inside: Removable handing rail, four adjustable shelves, two handy hooks, cable hole, safety wall screw holes.

Outside: Handle, lock, custom keyring, mustard logo, air vents.

Please note that stock availability can vary from time to time. It's best to ring or email before placing an order.

homewares.Body:
With a diamond pattern running along its sizable green and tan frame, this Capiz vase is an accent piece that can’t be missed. The oval shape and Capiz inlay amplify the vase’s bohemian style, and the size allows it to serve as a centerpiece on a table or mantle. An elegant design that complements its contents and surroundings, ideal for a living room or foyer.

homewares.Name: Marble Rolling Pin and Base
homewares.Body: Made from marble, with timber handles, these rolling pins are durable and heavy enough to make smooth pastry a breeze. homewares.Name: Calavera Dancing Couple
homewares.Body:
There is probably no more iconic symbol for Day of the Dead than the skull, or “calavera”. The “calavera” is usually an ornately decorated representation of a skull, often featuring flowers, animals, and other decorations. During the holiday, this imagery is seen everywhere, from Ofrendas, to paper crafts, and even to cartoons on newspapers. In a way, the Calavera has become an embodiment of the holiday itself.

Made from resin.

homewares.Name: Vintage Vases
homewares.Body: This abstract set of vases or objets d'art are made from recycled oil drums. Both come with deco style angled handles giving each piece a striking angled finish. The oil drums are beaten into shape, and are smooth to the finish, but show dimpled elements of the moulding process. The colour tones are a mottled gunmetal brown finish with a low sheen finish.

lighting.Name: Woven Table Lamp Medium
lighting.Body:
Natural beauty and style exude from this woven paper table lamp. Seated on a circular wooden base, the body is shaped in a bulbous formation made from iron and a crisscross paper lattice finish. Seated inside, the light will splay out when turned on, shooting out in all directions through the latticed body. Lamps are useful to have all around the home to create extra light when needed. Stand this one in the entrance way, the living area or even next to your arm chair to brighten up the area while you’re reading. 

Available in natural, black and white.

mirrors.Name: Starburst Mirror
mirrors.Body: A beautiful wall mirror inspired by the Baroque era, our Starburst mirror is ideal for creating a statement in any living space. It features layers of floral-inspired shapes that frame the central mirror, changing in colour and size as they progress outward. This mirror makes a lovely addition to vintage-inspired spaces, as well as clean, modern living areas in need of a splash of opulence.

mirrors.Name: Antique White Mirrors
mirrors.Body: These mirrors offers classic style in a versatile, neutral finish for a look that works beautifully into nearly any home. Featuring a distressed, antique white frame, this mirror fits in spaces with a traditional, farmhouse, vintage, ocean- or nautical-inspired styles. Use in a master bedroom, large bathroom, or in an entryway.

mirrors.Name: Antique White Mirrors
mirrors.Body: These mirrors offers classic style in a versatile, neutral finish for a look that works beautifully into nearly any home. mirrors.Body: The Nediva mirror, with a metal frame in a black finish, has an arched window design and is 165cm high, perfect for full viewing. It is also the ideal piece to create a more visual space and add brightness to your interiors. Take advantage of it to add a stylish touch to your hallway or wardrobe for your full outfit look.
