mirrors.Body: Paneled like a decorative window, this long mirror offers a way to integrate an appreciation for classic architecture into everyday interior decor. The frame itself is made from solid fir wood, finished in a highly distressed whitewash for rustic appeal.

mirrors.Name: Geometric  Mirror
mirrors.Body: For a stand out piece in modern and minimalist homes, our geometric pendant mirror with a leather strap is a must-have. It features a sleek design framed with black iron, suspended with a lovely thick piece of leather. This is a fabulous wall mirror with a unique shape that will not only stand out but stand the test of time.

mirrors.Name: Wall Round Mirror
mirrors.Body: Modern and minimalist in design, our round pendant wall mirror is elegant in its simplicity. Fitted with a thin black iron frame, it’s attached to a small metallic clip, which is suspended by a round black iron ring, ready for hanging. If you’re looking for a sleek mirror that is understated as well as striking – our round pendant wall mirror is a wonderful choice.

mirrors.Name: Octagonal Mirror
mirrors.Body: Classic paneled mirror with bevilled edging on the glass.

mirrors.Name: Octagonal Mirror
mirrors.Body: Classic paneled mirror with bevilled edging on the glass.

mirrors.Name: WA Marri Mirror
mirrors.Body:
Marri timber is renowned for its distinctive
gum veins and characteristics which make
it one of the most unique timbers in the
world and the perfect timber for creating
fine handcrafted furniture.
Such characteristics are born from
withstanding extreme weather conditions
such as bushfires, severe storms and
prolonged periods of drought.
The Marri timber used in this product is
ethically sourced from some of Australia’s
largest and most reputable timber
suppliers. Our suppliers are proactive and
work closely with various government
bodies to ensure the longevity and
sustainability of this precious specie, as
well as strictly abiding by forestry
regulations and laws.

mirrors.Name: Cluster Mirrors
mirrors.Body: Hang one or hang them all! You are only limited by your own imagination as to how you configure these mirrors. Made from recycled Teak.

mirrors.Name: Filigree Freestanding Mirror
mirrors.Body:
Freestanding mirrors are a classic! This particular Filigree metal mirror is nothing short of visually outstanding, particularly because of the use of patterning and colouring on the frame. A light, dusty gold oozes off of the frame, which compliments the reflective and light nature of the glass. A lovely metal standing application rests finely, yet sturdily behind the mirror which allows for easy placement anywhere in your home.

Please note:  The mirror is rectangular rather than square shape as appeared in images

mirrors.Name: Ethnicraft Driftwood Mirror
mirrors.Body: A mirror doesn't always have to be hung on a wall. Leaning one against a wall creates an unique visual.

mirrors.Name: Ethnicraft Driftwood Mirror
mirrors.Body: A mirror doesn't always have to be hung on a wall. Leaning one against a wall creates an unique visual.

mirrors.Name: Ethnicraft Driftwood Mirror
mirrors.Body: A mirror doesn't always have to be hung on a wall. Leaning one against a wall creates an unique visual.

mirrors.Name: Ethnicraft Driftwood Mirror
mirrors.Body: A mirror doesn't always have to be hung on a wall. Leaning one against a wall creates an unique visual.

mirrors.Name: Round Aluminium Embossed Mirror
mirrors.Body: This gorgeous aluminium mirror has been embossed with a pattern of leaves and berries, and features triangular cutouts throughout the frame for a unique stencil look.

mirrors.Name: Teak Branch Mirror
mirrors.Body: A statement wall mirror with teak detailing that will give your space contemporary charm and natural vibes. Match with the Teak Branch Console for $790!

mirrors.Name: East Hall Mirror
mirrors.Body:
Reclaimed timber hallway mirror.

Dimensions: 600 x 115 x 1420mm (h)

mirrors.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Frame Mirror
mirrors.Body: Frame your reflection with the elegant oak Light Frame mirror. Lean this full-length mirror against the wall, or mount it up vertically or horizontally. Tall and bold, this mirror handsomely adds brightness and stature to the living space. Now available in black.

mirrors.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Frame Mirror
mirrors.Body: Frame your reflection with the elegant oak Light Frame mirror. Lean this full-length mirror against the wall, or mount it up vertically or horizontally. Tall and bold, this mirror handsomely adds brightness and stature to the living space. Now available in black.

mirrors.Name: Solid Timber Framed Mirror
mirrors.Body:
No end to the talent of the RAT Man. Just a very simple concept using recycled timber as a frame for a mirror.

MADE IN BALLARAT!

This product is made locally from reclaimed Australian timber. Because it is made locally from recycled timber we can customise this product to your exact needs. Come in store or give us a call to discuss what you need.

lockers.Name: Mustard Midi Locker
lockers.Body:
The Midi has maximum storage potential. Use her as a toy cupboard, in the kitchen or hiding all the shoes + umbrellas in the hallway. New colour...Poppy!

Inside: Two adjustable shelves (in four parts), two handy hook, cable hole, safety wall screw holes.

Outside: Handles, locks, custom keyrings, mustard logo, air vents.

Please note that stock availability can vary from time to time. It's best to ring or email before placing an order.

lockers.Name: Mustard Twinny Locker
lockers.Body:
The Twinny is the Skinny's big sister - more than just a wardrobe, it's all of your colourful storage dreams in one! The same width as The Midi + the same height as The Skinny, but a little bit deeper for extra hanger space!

Designed for everyone, from teeny baby clothes to a full grown-up wardrobe. The two rails mean little people can reach their favourite outfits, might even help them get dressed faster in the morning! The four shelves can be moved wherever you need them.

lockers.Name: Mustard Locker Baskets
lockers.Body:
Set of 1 large and 2 small baskets designed to fit inside your locker just right. The big one fits one per shelf and the two small can fit on one shelf. They also fit under the locker or on top for when you really need to maximise the storage! New colour just dropped...Poppy!

Dimensions:

Big: 26 x 40 x 16cm (h)

Small: 17 x 24.4 x 16cm (h)

Please note that stock availability can vary from time to time. It's best to ring or email before placing an order.

lockers.Body:
The Lowdown is your new favourite console, tv station or office storage. Standing at the same height as The Shorty, she's wider but a little less deep. New colour...Poppy!

Outside: Handles, locks, custom keyrings, mustard logo, air vents.

Please note that stock availability can vary from time to time. It's best to ring or email before placing an order.

occasional-chairs.Name: Flow Rocking Chair
occasional-chairs.Body:
The Flow Rocking Chair is created with an obvious sense for modern lines and classic, Scandinavian minimalism, as is the case with all furniture from the upcoming brand. So, forget all about grandma’s lazy living room where time stands still, the Flow Rocking Chair fits perfectly in a modern, active home.

The Flow rocking chair is created with a comfortable upholstered seat and back cushion, and naturally, the frame is handmade from solid ash wood.

NOFU’s collections are handmade from sustainable PEFC certified and PU-covered wood. The chair’s seat is padded with a robust 100 % polyester fabric. As a result, the rocking chair is extremely easy to clean. All NOFU products REACH compliant and thus completely free from harmful chemicals. This makes all NOFU furniture very suitable for homes with small children.

furniture.Name: Chiminea
furniture.Body:
Chimineas originate from Mexico. They are an outdoor fireplace which has a large, slightly raised firebox and a short smoke chimney that is used to draw the smoke away by creating a draft. The firebox itself is ball-shaped, and the chimney is about one to one and a half times the height of the firebox.The advantage of this Chiminea outdoor fireplace is that the smoke stack makes the chiminea fireplace more efficient than fire pits and other outdoor fireplaces. The chiminea draws air in at the firebox level and drafts it up the chimney into the open air. This creates excellent air flow, feeding the fire so it burns hot and clean. That means a chiminea outdoor fireplace will produce less smoke.The ball-shaped firebox gives the chiminea two more advantages-size and safety. The firebox of the chiminea is plenty large to accommodate a lot of wood and to get a good fire going just as hot as you want it to be. Chiminea outdoor fireplaces are made from cast iron.

Available in three sizes with dining tables to match.

furniture.Name: Surpika Outdoor Chair
furniture.Body:
The Surpika chair in black is made from lightweight but hard wearing Polypropylene. With rounded lines, moulded arms and an included fabric seat cushion, it is designed with looks and comfort in mind. Treated for UV resistance and with powder coated steel legs, the Surpika is designed to last, making it suitable for indoor, alfresco and outdoor use.  Please note, the seat cushions are not suited to weather exposure and should be stored undercover when not in use.

Available in two colours.

furniture.Name: Surpika Outdoor Chair
furniture.Body:

With rounded lines, moulded arms and an included fabric seat cushion, it is designed with looks and comfort in mind. Treated for UV resistance and with powder coated steel legs, the Surpika is designed to last, making it suitable for indoor, alfresco and outdoor use.  Please note, the seat cushions are not suited to weather exposure and should be stored undercover when not in use.

furniture.Name: Square Pouf
furniture.Body:
This is a dose of pure comfort for outdoor living. Being modular, you can adapt this range to meet your needs. Available in three colours.

About this product...
Modular chaise pouffe with backrest, compatible with rest of the Square collection to create a sofa or corner sofa as big or small as you'd like.
100% suitable for indoor and outdoor spaces.
Lightweight and easily recyclable aluminium frame. 100% outdoor fabric with anti-humidity vents and a removable, machine-washable cover. Made in Europe using traditional techniques, reducing CO2 emissions for a lower environmental impact.

furniture.Body:

Constructed from reclaimed teak legs and top, the broad slats provide space for the wood to naturally expand and contract in. This stool is suitable for indoor or outdoor use.

furniture.Body:

The Hampton Outdoor Bench is available individually, or as a set with the Hampton Outdoor Table.

furniture.Name: Joh Outdoor
furniture.Body:
Comfort, style and quality. This outdoor lounge setting some might say is too good to be outside. Well guess what? Our outdoor style of living needs as much comfort, style and quality as our indoors.

Cushions are fade and weather resistant and the coffee table tops are ceramic.

Sofa measures 1900 x 750 x 850/450 heights.

Chair measures 700 x 750 x 850/450 heights.

Coffee table at 800 and 600 diameters.

furniture.Name: Ethnicraft Round Outdoor Table
furniture.Body:
The Ethnicraft Round Outdoor Table is all about inspiring your loved ones to spend a little more time at the table. Its solid legs intertwine in perfect balance, while the adapted grooved design makes outdoor life a simple pleasure.

Made from solid Teak

furniture.Name: Solid Teak Aidrondack Chair
furniture.Body: These teak Adirondack chairs are expertly manufactured from sustainable, durable grade-A teak. These chairs have been built to the highest spec from the finest hardwood so they're guaranteed to last you for decades of pleasure and comfort. Requiring little-to-no maintenance, these teak Adirondack chairs can be left outdoors all year round, representing excellent value for money. Create a stunning focal point for your outside setting as well as a haven for relaxation in the sunshine with your very own Aidrondack chair

furniture.Name: Sling Outdoor Chair
furniture.Body: This outdoor dining chair features a Batyline seat and back and teak inlaid arms which are cool to touch

furniture.Name: Rye Teak Outdoor Bench
furniture.Body: This classic modern outdoor bench is made from Solid Recycled Teak and fits neatly between the matching table legs.

furniture.Name: Lorne Outdoor
furniture.Body:
So much time is spent in our great outdoors so why not bring your lounge room comfort out there with you. The modular is comprised of 4 pieces that can be interchanged according to your needs.

 

  • . Aluminium frame
  • . Teak inlay on arms
  • . Fade and mold resistant cushions
  • . Ceramic topped coffee table

  • Lounge measures...2800 x 2200 x 800. Seat height 430. Back height 900.

    Coffee Table measures...1200 x 700 x 420(h).

furniture.Body:
You want outdoor furniture to last, be comfortable and not break the bank. But remember, you get what you paid for! This setting is going to last for many seasons to come!

  • . Teak inlay on arms
  • . Fade and mold resistant cushions

furniture.Name: Stainless & Timber Outdoor Furniture
furniture.Body:
Stainless steel frame with WA Karri slats. Frames are available in 304 and 316 marine grade. We can also do powder coated metal frames. Benches pictured measure 1500 x 360 x 450(h) and sell for $750 each.

This range is 100% locally made. The images shown are of custom orders we have designed and made. If you see something you like or have a different design in mind, call or email PFS to discuss your ideas.

furniture.Body:
An addition to the Hampton Range of Outdoor furniture is this Bar Table. Bar Stool is also available.

Stainless Steel and Teak are arguably the best combination of materials for low maintenance and long lasting outdoor furniture.

Stainless Steel and Teak are arguably the best combination of materials for low maintenance and long lasting outdoor furniture.

furniture.Body: Yes, these are outdoor chairs with leather back and seat cushions. The leather is a Marine grade that is used on boats. Only 6 left!

furniture.Body:
You asked for it...so here it is! The Hampton  has now a matching lounge setting with side and coffee tables as shown. All pieces can be purchased individually.

Stainless Steel and Teak are arguably the best combination of materials for low maintenance and long lasting outdoor furniture.

furniture.Body:
With an adjustable back, rear castors for easy moving and an optional tailored cushion for added comfort, the Hampton Sundeck completes the whole Hampton story.
Cushion sells for $135.

Stainless Steel and Teak are arguably the best combination of materials for low maintenance and long lasting outdoor furniture.

side-tables.Name: Capiz Round Side Table
side-tables.Body: 1. Can be used for Side Table, Accent Table and Stool, Weight Capacity: 300 lbs. <br data-mce-fragment="1">2. Fit for living room, bedroom, window. <br data-mce-fragment="1">3. The Capiz shell is handcrafted, cut and assembled by skillful artisans to make one-of-a-kind pieces, every pieces may have slight variations.<br data-mce-fragment="1">4. Every piece is finished with a final lacquer to ensure timeless brilliance. Very durable.

side-tables.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Geometric Side Table
side-tables.Body:
The Oak Geometric Side Table is something to be admired, by intersecting geometrical shapes and creating interaction, this side table not only looks different from every angle, it also becomes different. An absolute must have side table for any living room or even as a stylish bedside table.

Made of solid oak with a varnish finish.

side-tables.Name: Anaport Teak Side Table
side-tables.Body: Wood at its best! All natural displaying its unique characteristics. The Anaport can be used as a stool or side table

side-tables.Name: Nacre Side Table
side-tables.Body: For a touch of luxury this season, we present the stunning hand-made Nacre Collection. Nacre, also known as Mother of Pearl, is the precious material that gives the pearl stone its beautiful soft glow and is known to have powers of harmony from the sea.  Bring the feeling of relaxation and calmness into your home with the breathtaking Nacre Collection.

side-tables.Name: Terrazzo Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Terrazzo Table features a white terrazzo shelf atop a strong iron frame in a beautiful shade gold. Set this piece next to your couch, next to your bed, or fit it in those empty corners that need some colour and style.

side-tables.Name: Kipa Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Kipa Side Table is made from Teak root and finished with a walnut stain to enhance it's rugged rustic primitive appearance. Each piece will differ with evidence of knots, gnarls and burrs to showcase the natural flaws and rugged beauty of this resource. It's flaws are proudly displayed like a tattoo or scar, and will become the showcase piece to your room. The overall size and shape will differ slightly from piece to piece but are based on the size guide below.

side-tables.Name: Pebble Side Table
side-tables.Body:
The Pebble Side Table is made utilising teak root components which are sanded smooth bringing the natural oil content to the surface providing a lustrous sheen.

Each piece is glued and bolted together to form the Pebble Side Table. Each piece will vary in overall shape and look to some degree but sizing sits within the parameters with slight variance.

Evidence of knots, burrs and natural flaws are on display and vary from piece to piece to show the rugged rustic nature of the gnarled teak root source. No two tables will be the same to be as unique as you are.

side-tables.Name: Claire Shell Inlay Nesting Tables
side-tables.Body: A truly unique and versatile piece of furniture, there is so much to like about our Claire shell inlay nesting tables. Composed of a set of two small tables that fit neatly inside each other, this attractive piece is sure to come in handy. Prop these tables alone or together for easy storage options. Ideal for living rooms and bedrooms, and for displaying beautiful home decor.

side-tables.Name: C-Side Table
side-tables.Body: This C-shaped side table brings storage, style, and functionality to your seating group. Whether using it as the perfect perch for your morning mug of coffee or as the universal remote control hub, end tables are a staple in everyone's home. The tabletop offers plenty of space for sitting room essentials, and it fits easily into narrow nooks and cramped corners. The C-shape allows the table to sit flush with a chair or couch, you can nestle it next to you with your favorite snack, drink, or vase.  This piece sports clean lines and works well with any room decor.

side-tables.Name: Up and Down Side Table
side-tables.Body:
The UP AND DOWN side table with a single tray made of oak is a type of small, portable table that is constructed from European Oak. This type of table typically features a tray on top that can be used for holding drinks or other items. 

 The Single Tray Table features 1 shelf. The European White Oak a type of hardwood known for its durability and attractive grain pattern. The light weight and sturdiness of the side table ensures it is versatile in any indoor environment. The table is equipped with 1  removable tray on the top surface, for holding items such as books, magazines, remotes or drinks making it ideal for a living room or sitting area, as its simple and elegant design makes it ideal for any space in the house. The 1 tray is designed to fit perfectly on the unit in any direction with ease. Featuring Fsc Teak biscuits in the corners creates simple interest in an elegant piece of hand crafted furniture.

side-tables.Name: Up and Down Side Table
side-tables.Body:
The UP AND DOWN side table with a single tray made of oak is a type of small, portable table that is constructed from European Oak. This type of table typically features a tray on top that can be used for holding drinks or other items. 

 The Single Tray Table features 1 shelf. The European White Oak a type of hardwood known for its durability and attractive grain pattern. The light weight and sturdiness of the side table ensures it is versatile in any indoor environment. The table is equipped with 1  removable tray on the top surface, for holding items such as books, magazines, remotes or drinks making it ideal for a living room or sitting area, as its simple and elegant design makes it ideal for any space in the house. The 1 tray is designed to fit perfectly on the unit in any direction with ease. Featuring Fsc Teak biscuits in the corners creates simple interest in an elegant piece of hand crafted furniture.

side-tables.Body:
Now a matching side table for the Connor Rocking Chair. See link.

side-tables.Name: Ethnicraft Side Table
side-tables.Body:
The rectangular tray table is one of our most versatile pieces: while it serves its function as a side table, its ability to adopt different trays allows you to mix or match various colors and patterns, creating a personal piece that is uniquely yours.

Made from black-tainted wood with a water-based varnish finish and a black metal frame.

Price listed is without the tray. The trays are available separately for $209 and come in two designs. See images below.

side-tables.Name: Marble Side Tables x 2
side-tables.Body:
Marble side tables are constructed of a solid marble top and painted black metal legs. Natural marble exhibits variances in vein colour. These variations are normal characteristics of all marble species.
Available in black or white.

side-tables.Name: Marble Side Tables x 2
side-tables.Body:
Marble side tables are constructed of a solid marble top and painted black metal legs. Natural marble exhibits variances in vein colour. These variations are normal characteristics of all marble species.
Available in black or white.

side-tables.Name: Dayton 2 Tier Side Table
side-tables.Body: Forget traditional boxy or round side tables and add a bit of character to your space with the Dayton Side Table. Crafted from bayur wood, this piece is unique in its design characterised by its eccentric double top structure layering two contrasting shapes. Style Dayton with your favourite sofa or armchair to really accentuate the personality of this piece!

side-tables.Name: Jenell Terrazzo Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Jenell Side Table is made of terrazzo and available in black or white. Take the terrazzo outside to bring an urban look to your garden. Jenell's design is a big, contemporary, versatile look that you can enjoy year-round as a side table or stool, thanks to the durability of this natural material no matter the weather conditions.

side-tables.Name: Jenell Terrazzo Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Jenell Side Table is made of terrazzo and available in black or white. Take the terrazzo outside to bring an urban look to your garden. Jenell's design is a big, contemporary, versatile look that you can enjoy year-round as a side table or stool, thanks to the durability of this natural material no matter the weather conditions.

side-tables.Name: Hakon ll Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Hakon square side table is crafted from solid mungur wood timber with a twist detail and carved centre to create a dynamic and unique piece for your room.

side-tables.Name: Lip Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Lip Side Table is the definition of simple and clean elegance. This side table features a Mango wood lipped tabletop with three black iron legs. Use this in the bedroom, in the living room or next to the bath for all the essentials, the opportunities are endless.

side-tables.Name: Circ Side Table
side-tables.Body:
Made from Australian Oak with one felt-lined drawer, full extension runners, dovetailed joins and a timeless design that would suit a modern or classic home. Matching coffee table available.

Australian Oak Timber is a premium hardwood that encompasses species which grow in the mountainous areas of Tasmania. Our Australian Oak is hand selected at the mill to ensure it's of the highest grade and quality, which allows us to produce stunning timber furniture. We ensure that our selection of Australian Oak has a consistent natural light brown colour, with an abundance of unique & natural features which includes hues of colour varying from straw to reddish brown with intermediated shades of cream and pink. The beauty of Australian Oak Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same. The gum veins and natural characteristics seen in Australian Oak timber are not found in any other hardwood timbers.

side-tables.Name: Ethnicraft Teak Tabwa Side Tables
side-tables.Body: The Tabwa collection offers timeless centrepieces of minimalistic silhouette with a unique and distinct character. Contemporary wooden furniture is transformed into unique pieces of art where each pattern is carefully carved by our artisans. Named after the Tabwa culture from Central Africa, the collection’s inspiration comes from their fondness for linear geometric motifs.

side-tables.Name: Flore Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Flore Side Table is an art deco inspired piece. Combining premium materials with beautiful simplicity. The Flore is constructed from reclaimed timber with metal edging on the top and bottom.

side-tables.Name: Asha Side Tables
side-tables.Body: Asha side table is constructed of a solid acacia wood top and painted black metal legs. Natural timbers may exhibit variances in grain colour and texture sometimes visible knots filling and butterfly joints will be evident and it can change colour with age. These variations are normal characteristics of all timber species.

side-tables.Name: Laptop Side Table
side-tables.Body:
Very clever idea! A 'hospital' table for a couch. And not just for a laptop.

Top is made from Parquetry Mindi wood with a black metal frame.

side-tables.Name: Ethnicraft N701 Oak Side Table
side-tables.Body: The N701 side table was designed specifically for the popular Homonymous sofa, but it is just at home with any sofa. Its thin metal legs slide under the sofa smoothly, while the oak tabletop provides more surface. Designed by Jacques Deneef.

side-tables.Name: Turquoise Round Side Table
side-tables.Body:
If you’re looking for some island style in your home or space, then the Turquoise shell side table will do the trick. A heavy bottomed, beautifully shaped side table with a striking white background, its stand out feature is its unique covering of hued shell pieces. The beauty of shell is in its colour and ability to reflect light. Whether you use this stunning shell inlay stool to sit on, rest your feet on or as a pair of side tables, the island feeling will not disappoint.

Each table is hand-made, unique and different.

side-tables.Name: Copacabana Round Side Table
side-tables.Body:
A round side table, stool or foot rest – introducing the beach inspired Copacabana side table. Adorned with discs of real sea shells that shimmer when they catch the light, this is a furniture piece that will instantly brighten and transform a space. Invest in a pair as bedside tables, use it as a stool for your desk, or as a stand-alone decor piece to rest a plant on, or even coffee table books.

Each table is hand-made, unique and different.

side-tables.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Tripod Side Table
side-tables.Body: The Tripod side table is a light, versatile piece that can be used on its own or in a group of several tables. It can easily be moved from room to room, placed next to a chair or a settee, or as a bedside table. The simple and sleek design of this tall side table will fit in nicely with any living room design.  Also available in teak (see website).

side-tables.Name: Capiz Square Side Table
side-tables.Body: Both the geometric body and triangular patterning of this capes stool make it an exceptional statement piece for any sitting area. The structure creates an hourglass shape, with broad surfaces angling toward a narrow center. The multi-coloured patterns throughout the frame make this a vibrant piece, perfect for sitting on or appreciating from a distance.

side-tables.Name: Capiz Hexagonal Side Table
side-tables.Body: 1. Can be used for Side Table, Accent Table and Stool, Weight Capacity: 300 lbs. <br data-mce-fragment="1">2. Fit for living room, bedroom, window. <br data-mce-fragment="1">3. The Capiz shell is handcrafted, cut and assembled by skillful artisans to make one-of-a-kind pieces, every pieces may have slight variations.<br data-mce-fragment="1">4. Every piece is finished with a final lacquer to ensure timeless brilliance. Very durable.

sideboards.Name: Messmate Sideboard II
sideboards.Body:
Australian Messmate Timber is grown deep in the forests of South Eastern Australia. Our Messmate is hand selected at the mill to ensure it's of the highest grade and quality, which allows us to produce stunning timber furniture. We ensure that our selection of Messmate Timber has a consistent natural light brown colour, with an abundance of unique & natural features. The beauty of Australian Messmate Hardwood Timber is that no two pieces are ever the same. The gum veins and natural characteristics seen in messmate timber are not found in any other hardwood timbers, making our product incredibly appealing.

Features rounded edges, soft closing doors, an internal drawer and black powder coated metal handles.

sideboards.Name: Nako Storage Sideboard
sideboards.Body: French designer Damien Mazingue has delivered the Nako range, a clever blend of recycled boatwood timber and powdercoated metal. Geometric forms provide clever storage compartments with the use of a metal frame central to the design highlighted with timber panels to create functional furniture pieces with a light fresh approach. This buffet unit is so versatile. It comprises of an open shelf storage at the base, 2 doors for bulky storage and 2 drawers, plus the tabletop.It is perfect against the wall or behind the sofa or down the hallway. The timber is a mixture of hardwood timbers sourced from old fishing vessels from North Java. Colour tones, knots, burrs and holes are evidence of it's previous use on the high seas and are not considered as faults. Remnants of colours can also vary from piece to piece and is part of the uniqueness of the range. Each item will match in the design and size but can differ in the colour variation of timbers and tones.

sideboards.Name: Solar Sideboard
sideboards.Body: A unique, bold piece, the Solar Sideboard is a new addition to our furniture collection. The craftsmanship is exceptional with hand engraved ovular loops that start from the centre of the wooden panel. The sideboard features two sliding doors - a nod to a more vintage style of furniture design. This is a striking piece for a range of interiors and spaces. Hand crafted from reclaimed, ethically sourced Mango hardwood, natural deviations, knots, marks etc are normal characteristics and should not been seen as faults.

sideboards.Name: Slatted Hardwood Sideboard
sideboards.Body:
Yet another 60s inspired piece in our newest furniture collection, our Slatted Wooden Sideboard is a beautiful nod to the designs of that vintage period. This hardwood sideboard features a unique curved oblong shape. The rounded wooden storage panel contains two cabinet doors for ample storage. The look of this beautiful sideboard is made complete with matching wooden tapered legs. This is a beautifully designed and crafted piece that will suit a range of interior styles.

Hand crafted from reclaimed, ethically sourced Acacia hardwood, natural deviations, knots, marks etc are normal characteristics and should not been seen as faults.

sideboards.Name: Ethnicraft Oak Shadow Sideboard
sideboards.Body:

This sideboard comes in 3 sizes, 3 door, 4 door, and 5 door.

The Ethnicraft brand has been synonymous with producing exceptional quality furniture with groundbreaking designs for years and years. Their oak range is a true testament to this. Solid oak with an Osmo finish. Osmo is a sealant that does not change the appearance of the timber as would an estapol or lacquer keeping the timber looking as natural as possible and highly protected from stains.

sideboards.Name: Marri Sideboard
sideboards.Body:
Marri (Corymbia Calophylla), commonly referred to as ‘West Australian Redgum’ is a Eucalyptus Hardwood which has similar strength and density features to that of Jarrah.
The Marri tree can be found in abundance in the South West regions of Western Australia in the Jarrah and Karri Forests, with trees growing to heights of up to 40 meters.
Marri timber is renowned for its distinctive gum veins and characteristics which make it one of the most unique timbers in the world and the perfect timber for creating fine handcrafted furniture.
Such characteristics are born from withstanding extreme weather conditions such as bushfires, severe storms and prolonged periods of drought.
The Marri timber used in the production of this product is ethically sourced from some of Australia’s largest and most reputable timber suppliers. Our suppliers are proactive and work closely with various government bodies to ensure the longevity and sustainability of this precious specie, as well as strictly abiding by forestry regulations and laws.

stools.Name: Mushroom Stool (Black)
stools.Body: Woody Mushroom Stool with painted black sides and natural top utilises teak remnants means minimal waste and sustainable design. Perfect to use as a stool, or as a side table.  Tropica is an Indonesian family-owned furniture business that uses teak remnants from large manufacturers, resulting in minimal wasteage of timber resource. All Tropica teak is grown at Perhutani, a managed plantation that's controlled by the Indonesian government and is part of the Legal Wood Indonesia Alliance. This head-to-toe approach to wood uses everything including the roots, and offcuts from tree limbs to make a truly unique product. Each piece matches the specificied size but is unique, with knots, burrs, holes and gnarls adding to the character. Some pieces are sanded smooth to highlight the beautiful lustre and colour of teak and some are more rustic with a brushed, lightly distressed finish. Metal is finished with mottled brass colour tones, or matte colours with a low sheen. Tropica furniture is perfect for the home, but has also been used in multiple hospitality fitouts and display home projects

wall-art.Name: Leon Alexander Buynevic Artwork
wall-art.Body:
Leon has been a practicing artist for the past 20 years. His pieces focus on emotive subject matter, urban motifs and the abstraction of line, colour and form.  His work progresses the Neo-expressionist movement that rose to prominence in the 1980’s through chaotic and lively colour palettes, loaded compositions and diversified subjects.

His work aims to critique and comment on society and modern existence. In this new series of paintings, Pop culture and historical references are interlaced as symbols of power and oppression that doublespeak as Christian and pagan iconography to portray a psychedelic and dystopian society – still reaming from its destructive past and coming to grips with its future.

These are the works currently displayed and available for purchase at PFS.

Select from the drop box for pricing.

wallpaper.Name: Wallpaper
wallpaper.Body:
Custom wallpaper designed by KSJ, a local artist specialising in water-colour artwork to suit any space in your home.

You can select from established designs or have something bespoke made.

PVC-Free Wallpaper is the most eco-friendly and recyclable permanent wall graphic product available on the market, and is suitable for both permanent or short-term indoor wall graphics.

The wallpaper stock is printed with HP Eco-friendly UV Latex ink, and infused with glue on the backside which is activated when sprayed with water, for easy, mess-free installation.

The wallpaper is non-toxic and is US Greenguard Certified, suitable for use in the home and hospitals, childcare centres and the hospitality industry.

As a guide, the cost is $267 per square metre. That includes design, print and install. The price listed is for the wallpaper design on display at PFS.

wine-racks.Name: Teak Wine Rack
wine-racks.Body: The Teak wine rack is made from untreated sustainably sourced timber. A simple design, giving the wine bottles the forefront of the overall appearance. A solid timeless timber piece. Includes a handy drawer for storage. Stores 45 bottles. Now available in a smaller 20 bottle size with drawer.

wine-racks.Name: Taylor Wine Rack
wine-racks.Body: The Taylor wine rack captures the masculine charm of a well-loved workshop, with ample storage for your favourite drop. The Taylor Wine Rack is made from coated iron and MDF benchtop with a coated zinc top. This compact unit will hold 30 bottles of your favourite selection. Anti Topple wall brackets are included.

wine-racks.Name: Chevron Wine Rack
wine-racks.Body: This simple wine rack saves space and adds a unique visual to your room by storing the bottles parallel to the wall in a dynamic chevron pattern. The unit has two eyelet socket points to screw into the wall. Plugs and screws are not supplied. The rack holds sixteen bottles, & you can place multiple units side to side to create a great wall feature. The Chevron Wine rack is made from coated iron in a black gunmetal colour finish

wine-racks.Name: Mini Bar
wine-racks.Body: Two Tone Mini Bar on castors is made from Pine wood and metal trim. Compact & moveable, it brings the drinks cabinet to you. There is storage for 16 bottles of wine, glass storage & mixers and spirits in the pull out door. Extra storage is in the 2 pull out drawers, it truly is the great entertainer.

wine-racks.Name: Timber Wine Rack
wine-racks.Body:
Store, age and display your wine in style with this modern and expandable Timber Wine Rack. Designed to complement any kitchen, cellar, restaurant or bar. Simple to assemble with the potential to expand as your wine collection grows.

The timber is hardwood in a natural finish.

wine-racks.Name: Prestige Wine Rack
wine-racks.Body:
The exclusive and high-quality wine rack system PRESTIGE combines functionality with design. Give your wine cellar, your wine store or wine tasting room an elegant atmosphere in which your guests can thoroughly enjoy the tasting of wine. PRESTIGE will look amazing in your living space as well. The pre-assembled wine racks are elaborately constructed and hold your wine bottles securely. Thanks to the different shaped inserts of the different modules you can professionally organize your wine according to type, bottle shape and vintage. Our craftsmen manufacture PRESTIGE with much love for detail and accurately. The quality of the material and the passion of the craftsmen can be felt in every detail. All wine racks are manufactured accurate to the millimetre. For the 20 mm thick frame, plantation oak wood boards are used. Thanks to the shelf thickness PRESTIGE is extremely robust and stable. The insert shelves are 20mm thick and ensure an effortless storage of wine bottles in a horizontal, vertical or even a diagonal manner.

Locally made so we can offer custom sizes and timber stain colours

wine-racks.Name: Riddling Rack
wine-racks.Body: The method of “riddling”, or turning/rotating champagne bottles was originally invented by a woman, Barbe-Nicole Clicquot Ponsardin (The Widow Cliquot) in the 19th Century. The Widow Cliquot invented the rack and the method of turning champagne bottles on mass in her cellars to increase the production of her cellars over that of her rivals. It is still practiced in many champagne houses today, although in recent years there has been a move by the large commercial producers to mechanized rotation. An expert cellar worker, it is said, can turn as many as fifty thousand bottles in a day, and these skilled employees carry on the tradition when making vintage champagne in France. By the 1830s, winemakers throughout the Champagne turned to standing A-frame racks called pipitres. The word means “desk,” but in fact they look like old-fashioned childhood easels. They can be found in cellars in any part of the world where sparkling wine is crafted. These hold 120 bottles
